definitions: 間一髪[かんいっぱつ] (n) hair's breadth
japanese: 間一髪セーフってトコか！

definitions: セーフ (n) safe
japanese: 間一髪セーフってトコか！

definitions: 気合[きあい] (n) scream, yell, fighting spirit
english: Don't worry! I can handle this!
japanese: 心配いらね～って！この手のモンは気合いだ！

definitions: 交互[こうご] (n, adj-no) mutual, reciprocal, alternate
english: I see, just alternate the two levers up and down, right!?
japanese: なるほど、左右交互にレバーを上下すりゃいいんだな！

definitions: 飛ばす[とばす] (aux-v, v5s) to let fly, to make fly, to send flying, to blow off (e.g. in the wind), to launch, to fire, to hurl, to shoot,to skip over, to leave out, to omit, to drop (e.g. a stitch),to run fast, to drive fast, to gallop,to spray, to splash, to spatter,to say without reservation, to call out (e.g. a jeer), to rattle of (e.g. a joke),to spread (e.g. a rumour), to circulate, to send out (a message), to issue (e.g. an appeal),to transfer (to a less important post), to send away (e.g. to a provincial branch), to demote,to dispatch quickly (e.g. a reporter),to get rid of, to burn off (alcohol),to attack (e.g. with a leg manoeuvre),to do vigorously, to do roughly, to do energetically
english: We're gonna fly!! Hold on tight!!
japanese: とばすぜ！しっかり、つかまってな！！

definitions: やいのやいの (exp, adv, adv-to, adj-no) (pressing) hard, badgeringly, pesteringly, repeatedly, urgingly
english: I KNOW, already! Just shut up and sit tight! If we keep this up, we'll crash right into North Corel!
japanese: わ～かってらあ！やいのやいの、さわぐなって！このままじゃ、北コレルにつっこんじまう！！

definitions: 騒ぐ[さわぐ] (v5g, vi) to make noise, to make racket, to be noisy,to rustle, to swoosh,to make merry,to clamor, to clamour, to make a fuss, to kick up a fuss,to lose one's cool, to panic, to act flustered,to feel tense, to be uneasy, to be excited
english: I KNOW, already! Just shut up and sit tight! If we keep this up, we'll crash right into North Corel!
japanese: わ～かってらあ！やいのやいの、さわぐなって！このままじゃ、北コレルにつっこんじまう！！

definitions: 相当[そうとう] (adv) corresponding to (in meaning, function, etc.), being equivalent to,appropriate, suitable, befitting, proportionate,to be proportionate to, to be in keeping with, to be deserving of, to be worthy of,considerable, substantial,considerably, rather, quite, fairly, pretty
掃討[そうとう] (n, vs) cleaning up, sweeping up, mopping up
総統[そうとう] (n) supreme ruler, generalissimo,president (of Taiwan),fuhrer, fuehrer
双頭[そうとう] (adj-no, n) double-headed
争闘[そうとう] (n, vs) strife, struggle
勦討[そうとう] (n, vs) complete annihilation
想到[そうとう] (n, vs) thinking of, hitting upon
相等[そうとう] (n) equality, being equal
english: Must've been a horrific battle. You have scars all over your body.
japanese: そうとうキツイ戦いだったんだろ？体じゅう傷だらけじゃねぇか

definitions: 坑夫[こうふ] (n) miner
english: To hell with Meteor! We're Coal Miners, ain't we?
japanese: メテオがなんだってんだい！オレたちゃ炭坑夫なんだぜ

definitions: 逃げ延びる[にげのびる] (v1, vi) to make good one's escape, to escape to a safe place, to make one's getaway, to effect one's escape
english: We'll dig a deep tunnel and hide from the Meteor!
japanese: 長～いトンネルをほってメテオから逃げのびてやらあ！

definitions: 魂消る[たまげる] (v1, vi) to be astonished, to be flabbergasted, to be startled, to be amazed
japanese: あんたたちたまげたもんだぜ！

definitions: 神様[かみさま] (n) God, god,ace, king, superior person, god (amongst men)
japanese: オレたちが何をしたっていうんだ…神さまよぅ……

definitions: 為る[する] (aux-v, vs-i) to do, to carry out, to perform,to cause to become, to make (into), to turn (into),to serve as, to act as, to work as,to wear (clothes, a facial expression, etc.),to judge as being, to view as being, to think of as, to treat as, to use as,to decide on, to choose,to be sensed (of a smell, noise, etc.),to be (in a state, condition, etc.),to be worth, to cost,to pass (of time), to elapse,to place, or raise, person A to a post or status B,to transform A to B, to make A into B, to exchange A for B,to make use of A for B, to view A as B, to handle A as if it were B,to feel A about B,verbalizing suffix (applies to nouns noted in this dictionary with the part of speech "vs"),creates a humble verb (after a noun prefixed with "o" or "go"),to be just about to, to be just starting to, to try to, to attempt to
刷る[する] (v5r, vt) to print,to color or pattern fabric using a wooden mold
剃る[そる] (v5r, vt) to shave
擦る[する] (v5r, vt) to rub, to chafe, to strike (match), to file, to frost (glass),to lose (e.g. a match), to forfeit, to squander one's money (e.g. through gambling, Pachinko, etc.)
掏る[する] (v5r, vt) to pick someone's pocket
english: We got into this situation because we goofed…
japanese: ボクらがミスったばっかりにこんなことになるやなんて……

definitions: 光景[こうけい] (n) scene, spectacle, sight, view
接見[せっけん] (n, vs) interview
english: Would you go check on it immediately?
japanese: 直接見にいってくれないか？

definitions: ボール (n) ball,ball (pitch that falls outside of the strike zone),bowl,board (cardboard, pasteboard, etc.)
japanese: 『スーパーボール』を手にいれた！

definitions: 差し上げる[さしあげる] (v1, vt) to give, to offer,to lift up, to hold up, to raise
english: Although there isn't anything we can give you, we'll make sure you can stop in and stay any time. So be sure to drop by.
japanese: 差し上げられるものは、何もないのだがいつでも泊まれるようにしておくから使ってくれ

definitions: 腕[かいな] (ctr) arm (esp. upper arm),counter used to measure the thickness of round objects
かいな (prt) expresses incredulousness, disbelief, irony, etc.
忍び[しのび] (n) stealth,travelling incognito (traveling),ninjutsu,ninja,sneak theft, sneak thief,tolerance
english: I knew this day would come, so after the Shinra left, I sneaked in and took the Materia.
japanese: いつかこういう時がくると思って神羅がいなくなったあと忍びこんで、マテリアを持ち出しておいたのです
